channel.title: Can't create new account
channel.description:
Whenever i try to register an account on the wiki, i get this message:
[quote] Login error The user account was not created, as we could not confirm its source. Ensure you have cookies enabled, reload this page and try again. [/quote] Cookies are enabled, i've tried reloading the page, and i've tried not asking it to remember my login for 180 days.

item.title: Can't create new account
item.dc:creator: Cameron_D
item.description:
Excellent, time to do stuff.

Read full topic

Thanks for the update. Please keep us posted.

Read full topic

item.title: Can't create new account
item.dc:creator: Conti
item.description:
Yeah, we’re having this issue since the wiki makeover. It is a problem in the server. New users can’t make an account, and registered users can’t update the articles (myself included).
Rm and Hubi are checking the problem, but they have no update yet.

Read full topic

item.title: Can't create new account
item.dc:creator: pizzahut
item.description:
Cameron :smiley: :

I am also unable to log in, I get the same message about enabling cookies, I’ve tried from several different browsers […], all with the same result.

Same here.

Read full topic

item.title: Can't create new account
item.dc:creator: RiscIt
item.description:
Me three…

Upon submitting the wiki account creation form (choosing username, password, email, etc) I get the following:

Login error
The user account was not created, as we could not confirm its source. Ensure you have cookies enabled, reload this page and try again.

Cookies are most definitely enabled. Tried from 2 different browsers (Chrome 21.x and IE 9)

Read full topic

item.title: Can't create new account
item.dc:creator: Cameron_D
item.description:
I am also unable to log in, I get the same message about enabling cookies, I’ve tried from several different browsers/computers, all with the same result.

Read full topic

Whenever i try to register an account on the wiki, i get this message:

Login error
The user account was not created, as we could not confirm its source. Ensure you have cookies enabled, reload this page and try again.

Cookies are enabled, i’ve tried reloading the page, and i’ve tried not asking it to remember my login for 180 days.
